In Iraq, thousands of Shiites rally to demand US troops leave the country.
Two people are killed in Georgia as an anti - government protest in Tbilisi turns violent.
In Yemen, demonstrators protest the government's plan to arrest an opposition tribal chief.
Fighting in the oil - rich Abyei region of Southern Sudan will not provoke war, says the South Sudan President.
In China, bomb attacks on government buildings kill two people.
In Japan, Greenpeace says marine life near the damaged nuclear plant shows increasing amounts of radiation.
